Size ISO: 5,00 GB (bajtÃƒÂ³w: 5Ã‚Â 372Ã‚Â 528Ã‚Â 640)

Burn ISO on DVD (DVD9) or mount in daemon or VMware or prepare bootable USB (8GB minimum):
Use: Rufus or other progz, or make manualy bootable USB:

How prepare bootable USB to install Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1:

WARNING! You do this at your own risk! Further steps delete the contents of the USB drive!
Make a copy of the earlier if you need to!

console => cmd [enter]
diskpart [enter...]

list disk
select disk [select your disk USB - carefully!]
clean
create partition primary
select partition 1
active
format fs=ntfs quick
assign

exit
exit

copy whole DVD/.ISO on USB
install system


Activation - read info in activation.txt or activation_VL.txt

In ADDONS folder:
- DirectX v9.29.1974 (as you need to reinstall)
- NET Framework 4.5.2 32bit_64bit EN (2015.04)
- setupcomplete with NET4.5.2

In Windows.7.SP1.IE11.EN.x64.April.2015-NiKKA_FAT32 instructions on how to quickly convert ISO to ISO file with the split install.wim on install.swm, install2.swm (UEFI Boot friendly)

These and other, newer, new - will be on Windows Update.

P.S.2. Do not remove pendrive/DVD during the installation until it is fully installed - get a working desktop.


System settings unchanged. Integrated via Slipstream. Mastering via scripts (DISM, IMAGEX, OSCDIMG, CMD)
